unnormalised: Thik aacha, mwjangnai gwswm Rahul Linear Algebra exam niao gwrbwn gwrbwi bwrbai thagwmon. Bwini 3x3 matrix ni inverse khou manwna naywi bwkhw amou 11 PM ao phone khalamdwmon. Mwnse Prof. Sharma niwi sqrt(2) aro pi/4 gwrwbwi problem monbw hoihwidwmon. Ang bwkhou fongdwm, "Bhai, thik chill! Chandrayaan-4 nini trajectory hisap khalamnayani mwkhouwi dwkhamwi. Thikhwi Gauss-Jordan elimination apply khalam...nwngwi mwjangwi khongnai manwkhou bribe hoihw!" Bwwi mwjang mwjaiywi. Asa khalamwi bw pass jabai. Oyawi bw Goa plan khou prepone khalamnayw jabai.
normalised: Thik aacha, angni gwrbwn Rahul Linear Algebra examni bwkhraya gwjan gwjan swmai dongrmwn. Bwihang'ao thik gyara bajio fon khwlao ang'o ang'o thakhobai thwi somnaini mathaigiri matrixni inverse manwni bwkhraya. Gwbwn Sharma saharanio bwthoro gotho problem thwinai, jwdwi gwjwi thakhai rwi, square root of two hwr pi divided by four! Angwi gwthang, "Bhai, thikhino thikhobai! Thwinani bwjwi chandrayaan-fourni bwkhayao trajectory hisab khwlamnainwi thikhino. Gauss-Jordan elimination apply khwlabw...naigwrw gwrbwn gwjan thwinai man'wnwi, bribe hor!" Gwthang'ao manthayoi rwng. Asha khwlamwi bwthang'wi pass khwlabw. Dwino gwthang'wi Goa plan hwrwi prepone khwlamwi dongnwng.
